value.title: If AI Is Predicting Your Future, Are You Still Free?
value.excerpt: Yet the more we use AI to categorize people, predict their future, and treat them accordingly, the more we narrow human agency, which will in turn expose us to unchartered risks. Human beings have been using prediction since before the Oracle of Delphi.
